entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
